Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value to me, and I believe it would serve you equally well. Given its unique features and potential benefits, I estimate its worth to be significantly higher than what you might find elsewhere. Considering its true value, I am offering it to you for $950,000. This price reflects not only the product's intrinsic qualities but also the opportunity to secure such a high-quality item at a premium yet reasonable cost. I look forward to your consideration of this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
